item.title: Report E-2024110211
item.description:
Report E-2024110211

Identified by scraper @ 2024-11-14T12:23:23+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-29
  • City: PHOENIX
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R & L CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On October 29, 2024, three (3) 50-pound bags of UN3378 were torn in transit and released approximately one (1) pound of product to the trailer interior. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from GrayMar Environmental Services (GES) to remediate the impacted site. Crews down stacked the pallet and collected three (3) 50-pound damaged bags. GES then utilized hand tools to collect the spent product off of the trailer floor. All spent product and damaged bags were collected and containerized into one (1) 30-gallon drum for terminal disposal.
